extension.description: Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over simpel, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.[CR][CR]Overweeg alstublieft om onze inspanningen te ondersteunen met een [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"kopje koffie"[/COLOR][/B] door de QR te scannen code hieronder of ga naar [COLOR deepskyblue]https://bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limoengroen] (Vrijgevigheid zoals die van jou is tegenwoordig zeldzaam. Ik dank je bij voorbaat voor je steun. Ik ben erg dankbaar voor je donatie en waardeer je vriendelijkheid enorm!)[/COLOR][COLOR hemelsblauw] • De Papaja[/COLOR]

Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.[CR][CR]Please consider supporting our efforts with a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code below or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]https://bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.[CR][CR]Please consider supporting our efforts with a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code below or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]https://bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.[CR][CR]Veuillez envisager de soutenir nos efforts avec une [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"tasse de café"[/COLOR][/B] en scannant le QR code ci-dessous ou en visitant [COLOR deepskyblue]https://bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limegreen] (Une générosité comme la vôtre est rare à trouver de nos jours. Je vous remercie d'avance pour votre soutien. Je suis très reconnaissante pour votre don et j'apprécie vraiment votre gentillesse !)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]
